name: Wood Tribe: Sylvans
description: The Wood Tribe, or Sylvans the Root Weavers, are a harmonious and nurturing people, deeply connected to the forests, known for their wisdom, healing abilities, and knowledge of plants and animals; their culture revolves around herbalism, woodworking, and animal husbandry, with a communal society valuing sustainability, and they reside in dense forests and ancient groves.
